fields.fieldTitle: What is your support email or contact form page url?
What is the name of your product / service?
What is this product or service you're asking for the testimonial?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software, course, book, coaching program, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is this the topic of your product or service in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ebook writing; copywriting; real estate investing, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 payoff your product / service gives people?

fieldHint.hint1: "The #1 payoff my product gives you is the ability to _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get your book done in record time; write amazing sales copy even if you can't sell; find and land profitable real estate investment deals, etc.
Ex: Funnel Hackers; aspiring authors; copywriters; real estate investors, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Who is the basic action your target audience wants to take in this area? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: write a book; write sales copy; find good real estate deals, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's a BIG payoff they really want? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: write a best selling book; create persuasive sales copy; find a million dollar investment deal, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's a big hurdle / problem / effort they wan to avoid? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: "They really want to avoid having to _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: spend days, weeks or months writing; hire an expensive copywriter; struggle for years trying to find real estate deals worth doing, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's a big benefit of using your product or service? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: write and publish your own real books in real time; create amazing sales copy at the push of a button; find as many real estate deals as you could ever want or need to do, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What's the "usual" solution or path others follow that they can now avoid because of your product or service?

fieldHint.hint1: "Now you don't have to sit around waiting for _____ like everyone else does."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: a "traditional" publisher to pick up your book; a copywriter to fit you into their schedule; the stars and moon to align so you can scrounge up a deal, etc.

fieldHint.hint1: "My customers really want to be a / an _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: real, published author; copy hacker; million dollar real estate investor, etc.
